PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValveTypeFlushing
PropertySetDef.Definition:
Valve that flushes a predetermined quantity of water to cleanse a WC, urinal or slop hopper.
Note that a flushing valve is constrained to have a 2 port  pattern.

PropertyDef.Name: FlushingRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The predetermined quantity of water to be flushed.

PropertyDef.Name: HasIntegralShutOffDevice
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the flushing valve has an integral shut off device fitted (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: IsHighPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the flushing valve is suitable for use on a high pressure water main (set TRUE) or not (set FALSE).
